name: Plantain Corn Muffins
author: Pixelsicle
summary: This is a recipe I came up with when I needed to use the last two over-ripe plantains in my fruit bowl.
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease 16 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Stir the flour, sugar, cornmeal, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Whisk the milk, plantains, eggs, oil, and butter together in a separate bowl
Mix the flour mixture into the milk mixture until just combined; do not over mix
Allow the mixture sit at room temperature for 10 to 15 minutes
Pour into prepared muffin cups to about 2/3 full
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and the tops spring back when lightly pressed, 15 to 18 minutes
